hadiths.text: Ibn 'Abbas told us:"The Messenger of Allah said to a woman from among the Ansar: 'When it is Ramadan, perform 'Umrah then, for 'Umrah during it is equivalent to Hajj

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي أَنْ يُقَالَ لِشَهْرِ رَمَضَانَ رَمَضَانُ
chapter.eng-name: Concession Allowing The Month Of Ramadan To Be Called (Merely) Ramadan
